question: A dish of sugar water was left on a window sill. One week later, there were only sugar crystals left in the dish. The water was gone. The best explanation for the appearance of sugar crystals is
candidate_answers: (A) some of the water was absorbed by the dish. (B) the air condensed. (C) the light shining on the window sill produced more sugar. (D) the water evaporated.
answer: some of the water was absorbed by the dish.
label: A
